707634f-a.title: Manhattan: 1st Ave. - 56th St.
707634f-a.text:
First Avenue at 5tth Street, N.W. corner. To be replaced by new
Phippd Hotel for Women.
June. 1925.
Na. ~2653

707635f-a.title: Manhattan: 1st Ave. - 56th St.
707635f-a.text:
First Avenue, east side, froa 56th to 57th Streets, after the
demolition of all but one of the old houses.
Septeaber 20, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
The same from a different angle.
September 20, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.

707636f-b.title: Manhattan: 1st Ave. - 56th St.
707636f-b.text:
(1)
First Avenue, west side, from 57th to 56th Streets, across clearing
at S.E. corner of 57th Street.
March 13, 1928.
P. L. Sperr, Photographer.
(2)
First Avenue at S.W. corner of 57th Street, across clearing at N.E.
corner of 56th Street.
March 13, 1928.
P. L. Sperr, Photographer.

707636f-a.title: Manhattan: 1st Ave. - 56th St.
707636f-a.text:
(1)

713786f-a.title: Manhattan: 56th Street - 1st Avenue.
713786f-a.text:
56th Street, south side, east from and including First Avenue. The 5oth Street buildings of Peter Doelger's Brewery are in
the background.
October 21, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
